name: one-dark-pro-modified-to-match-a-specific-powerpoint-theme
displayName: One Dark Pro Modified to Match a Specific PowerPoint theme
description: This theme matches the colors in the visually appealing Programming Language Workshop for Beginners theme available here: https://slidesgo.com/theme/programming-language-workshop-for-beginners#search-Programming&position-2&results-63 You can also easily remove error squiggles so that taking screenshots of incomplete code is easier.

themes.label: One Dark Pro for PL ppt theme
